snippet: The French oil giant Total plans to buy part of the Chesapeake Energy’s shale operation in Ohio while Sinopec agreed to buy a 30 percent stake in five shale operations from Devon Energy.
abstract: The French oil giant Total plans to buy part of the Chesapeake Energy’s shale operation in Ohio while Sinopec agreed to buy a 30 percent stake in five shale operations from Devon Energy.

headline.main: Sinopec and Total Continue Shale Gas Buying Spree
